name: NEW! leather cozy/cuff SNAP - mocha brown
description: leather cozy/cuff SNAP in mocha brown The cozy/cuff SNAP is a reusable coffee cup sleeve that doubles as a bracelet. Or a bracelet that doubles as a coffee cup cozy. Either way, it’s a stylish, eco-friendly alternative to the coffee shop cardboard sleeves. Here are just a few of the reasons why you’ll love the new leather cozy/cuff SNAP: You can wear it year round. In leather, the cozy/cuff SNAP makes the perfect all season accessory. It’s comfortable to wear, even in the summer. It looks great with everything. The leather cozy/cuff SNAP is the ultimate accessory – it instantly makes any outfit cuter, and looks great on any coffee cup. It gets better with age. The more you wear and use your leather cozy/cuff, the softer and more supple the leather becomes. (As if you needed another reason to wear it everyday.) It fits your wrist and your coffee cup perfectly. With two sets of snaps, the leather cozy/cuff is designed to fit both your wrist and your coffee cup. Just snap it on the larger size and slide it on your coffee cup. When you’re done, slip it off and snap it back on your wrist. It’s eco-friendly. Not only can you feel good about saving trees by replacing disposable cup sleeves with you cozy/cuff, but you can also be happy about that fact that it’s made from vegetable-tanned leather and colored with eco-friendly low-VOC dyes. SIZE Fits standard 12, 16, and 20 oz cups. Size small fits wrists up to 7”. Size medium fits wrists up to 7 ½”. Approximately 2 ¾” tall and 10” long. MATERIAL Laser cut from vegetable-tanned leather and colored with eco-friendly low-VOC dyes. COLOR Mocha brown with nickel silver snaps. As a result of the laser cutting, edges are dark brown. CARE Wipe clean. Made in the USA.

name: original cozy/cuff - light grey
description:
The cozy/cuff is a reusable coffee cup sleeve that doubles as a bracelet.  Or a bracelet that doubles as a coffee cup cozy.  Either way, it’s a stylish, eco-friendly alternative to the coffee shop cardboard sleeves.

Just slip the cozy/cuff on your coffee cup.  When you’re done, slide it off and slip it back on your wrist.  

SIZE
Fits standard 12, 16, and 20 oz cups. 
Approximately 2 ½” tall and 3” in diameter at the widest opening.

MATERIAL
Laser cut from 3mm thick wool felt.  Felt is a renewable resource that insulates better than cardboard.  And it's so soft and comfortable you’ll want to wear it everyday.

COLOR
Light heathered grey.  Seam is sewn with matching light grey thread.  As a result of the laser cutting, edges are a dark brown.

CARE
Spot clean only.  Do not machine wash.

Made in the USA.

name: NEW! cozy/cuff SNAP - aubergine
description:
The cozy/cuff SNAP is a reusable coffee cup sleeve that doubles as a bracelet.  Or a bracelet that doubles as a coffee cup cozy.  Either way, it’s a stylish, eco-friendly alternative to the coffee shop cardboard sleeves.

The cozy/cuff SNAP takes the idea of the original cozy/cuff but increases the function.  Two sets of snaps allow you to easily take the cozy/cuff from coffee cup to bracelet.

Snap it on the larger size and slide it on your coffee cup.  When you’r edone, slip it off and snap it on your wrist.

SIZE
Fits standard 12, 16, and 20 oz cups.  Size small fits wrists up to 7”.  Size medium fits wrists up to 7 ½”. 
Approximately 2 ¾” tall and 10” long.

MATERIAL
Laser cut from 3mm thick wool felt.  Felt is a renewable resource that insulates better than cardboard.  And it's so soft and comfortable you’ll want to wear it everyday.

COLOR
Dark purple/eggplant with antique black snaps.  As a result of the laser cutting, edges are dark brown.

CARE
Spot clean only.  Do not machine wash.

Made in the USA.
